scripts.prepr: npm run prepr:cloud && npm run prepr:portal
scripts.prepr:portal: cd growbe-portal && npm run lint:write && npm run ut:run
scripts.setversion: export VERSION=$(npm run version --silent) && cd proto && npm --no-git-tag-version version $VERSION && cd ../growbe-proxy && npm --no-git-tag-version version $VERSION && cd ../growbe-portal && npm --no-git-tag-version version $VERSION
scripts.setversion:develop: export VERSION=$(npm run version --silent)-SNAPSHOT-$(date +%d%m%y-%H%M)-$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) && cd proto && npm --no-git-tag-version version $VERSION && cd ../growbe-proxy && npm --no-git-tag-version version $VERSION && cd ../growbe-portal && npm --no-git-tag-version version $VERSION
